ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved lengthwise
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Place Brussels sprouts cut-side down on the pan to develop a caramelized crust
Duck fat adds rich flavor and creates extra crispy exteriors compared to oil
Drizzle lemon juice after roasting to brighten the dish and balance richness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the secret to making Brussels sprouts crispy on the outside and tender inside?
